title: JSKOS Concept Scheme
description: compiled collections of concepts (knowledge organization systems)

versionOf.description: concept scheme which this scheme is a version or edition of

namespace.description: URI namespace that all concepts URIs are expected to start with

uriPattern.description: URI pattern that all concept URIs are expected to match

notationPattern.description: regular expression that all primary notations should follow

concepts.description: JSKOS API concepts endpoint returning all concepts in this scheme

types.description: JSKOS API types endpoint returning all concept types in this scheme

distributions.description: Distributions to access the content of the concept scheme

license.description: Licenses which the full scheme can be used under
